Articles.Content:
Sparton Space Program Pack

Series Of Mods to Add A Limitless And Forge-able Feel to Kerbal Space Program

Current Version: Alpha V1.0

Heavy Development

Currently The Sparton Space Program Pack is under Massive Development, And Is in need Of Developers(I Cant Finsh this on my own!)

The Creator is asking for atleast 4 Developers With atleast 2 of the following Skills/Professions

-Modelling & Texturing

-G.U.I.

-Module Creation/Coding

-Beta Testing

-Debugging

-Project Management

If you have 2+ of the skills above and want to join the Dev Team, then Contact me on skype(sparton646 The Minecrafter)

Part Library

A-1 SAT DISH

A-1 WIRELESS TRANSMITTER

TONS MORE COMING SOON!

Resource Library

Tritium[density: # |transfer: X |flowMode: X |Stability: IDLE=# DRAW=# |MatterType: X |]

Propane[density: # |transfer: X |flowMode: X |Stability: IDLE=# DRAW=# |MatterType: X |]

Hydrogen[density: # |transfer: X |flowMode: X |Stability: IDLE=# DRAW=# |MatterType: X |]

Kurogen[density: 3 |transfer: EMSPump |flowMode: X |Stability: IDLE=-2.5 Draw=-7.5 |MatterType: SOLID |]

Module Library

resourceStability: Adds Stability Property to Resources(-25=RIFT(EXPLOSIVE&UNPREDICTABLE)-----0=Self-Stable(Default)-----25=Local(Area)Stable(Stabilizes Area)

{

}
